name: VCO - Waveshaping
description: This algorithm is based on the OG disting algorithms 'B-8 VCO with waveshaping' and 'B-7 VCO with linear FM'. There are four oscillator outputs: Triangle/saw, Square/pulse, Sub-octave square, and Sine. A shared waveshape parameter/CV controls both the shape of the triangle/saw and sine waves and the pulse width of the square/pulse wave. Linear through-zero FM is available via the 'FM input' parameter. If the 'Sync' input is used, a rising edge on the input sets the VCO phase to zero, which can produce oscillator sync sounds. It is perfectly valid to set the output bus for the four signals to the same bus, in which case they can be blended with their gain parameters.
gui_description: The display shows a single cycle of the triangle/saw and square/pulse waveshapes, and the VCO’s pitch as a MIDI note name plus cents and as a frequency in Hz.

parameters.name: Oversampling
parameters.description: Enables oversampling, to reduce aliasing noise at higher frequencies. The options are 'None', '2x', and '4x'.

parameters.name: FM scale
parameters.description: Sets the Hz/V sensitivity of the linear FM input.

parameters.name: Triangle/saw amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the triangle/saw output (before it’s affected by the gain).

parameters.name: Square/pulse amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the square/pulse output (before it’s affected by the gain).

parameters.name: Sub amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the sub-octave output (before it’s affected by the gain).

parameters.name: Sine amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the sine output (before it’s affected by the gain).

parameters.name: Triangle/saw gain
parameters.description: Sets the level of the triangle/saw output.

parameters.name: Square/pulse gain
parameters.description: Sets the level of the square/pulse output.

parameters.name: Sub gain
parameters.description: Sets the level of the sub-octave output.

parameters.name: Sine gain
parameters.description: Sets the level of the sine output.

parameters.name: MIDI channel
parameters.description: If enabled, MIDI notes on the specified channel will set the pitch of the VCO.

parameters.name: Triangle/saw mode
parameters.description: The add/replace mode for the triangle/saw signal.

parameters.name: Square/pulse mode
parameters.description: The add/replace mode for the square/pulse signal.

parameters.name: Sub output mode
parameters.description: The add/replace mode for the sub-octave signal.

parameters.name: Sine output mode
parameters.description: The add/replace mode for the sine signal.

input_ports.name: Shape input
input_ports.description: CV input controlling waveshape/pulse width (±5V corresponds to ±100%).

input_ports.name: Sync input
input_ports.description: Oscillator sync trigger input (rising edge resets phase).

input_ports.name: Shape input
input_ports.description: The waveshape CV input (scaled so that ±5V corresponds to the ±100% parameter range).

output_ports.name: Triangle/saw output
output_ports.description: Output bus for triangle or sawtooth waveform.

output_ports.name: Square/pulse output
output_ports.description: Output bus for square or pulse waveform.

output_ports.name: Sub output
output_ports.description: Output bus for sub-octave square waveform.

output_ports.name: Triangle/saw output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the triangle/saw signal.

output_ports.name: Square/pulse output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the square/pulse signal.

output_ports.name: Sub output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the sub-octave signal.

output_ports.name: Sine output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the sine signal.
